personal.title: Energy Harvesting Using Piezoelectric
description: Simulated a piezoelectric sensor-based energy harvesting tile converting mechanical pressure and vibrations into electrical energy.
Engineered a complete power management circuit including piezobender, full-wave bridge rectifier, and buck converter.
Developed a Simulink model to analyze performance under different vibration sources.
Validated conversion of mechanical energy to usable electrical power.

personal.title: PLC Simulated Smart Room Control
description: Designed and simulated a smart room control system using Siemens TIA Portal V16 and S7 PLCSIM V16.
Implemented ladder logic for automated AC and fan control using TON timers, TP timers, and SR flip-flops.
Conducted financial analysis demonstrating significant cost savings.
Focused on energy efficiency and sustainability.
